title: Card Case, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, mica, bast fiber
Technique: fragments of woven silks, mica and needle lace on a wire armature wound with bast fiber
creditline: Gift of Marquis Val Verde de la Sierra
description: A purse in envelope form with a three-lobed flap. Small fragments of 18th century dress brocades are covered with mica to fill openings in straw needle lace. Edged with silk and metal braided cord; lined with green silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Card Case, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk, mica, bast fiber
Technique: fragments of woven silks, mica and needle lace on a wire armature wound with bast fiber. Gift of Marquis Val Verde de la Sierra. 1923-51-14.
